update.column: select mps.id AS "ID", TO_CHAR(mps.purchase_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS "Fecha de Compra", mps.nit AS "NIT", mps.client_ally_id AS "ID de Aliado del Cliente", mps.company_name AS "Nombre de la Empresa", ccapos.code AS "Código del Punto de Venta", mps.point_of_sales_name AS "Nombre del Punto de Venta", mps.city_id AS "ID de la Ciudad", mps.city_name AS "Nombre de la Ciudad", mps.buy_amount AS "Monto de Compra", mps.settled_comission AS "Comisión Liquidada", mps.tax_profile_id AS "ID del Perfil Tributario", mps.loan_id AS "ID del Préstamo", mps.client_id AS "ID del Cliente", mps.channel_id AS "ID del Canal", mps.settlement_status AS "Estado de Liquidación", mps.amount_comission AS "Monto de la Comisión", mps.amount_va_commision AS "IVA de comisión", round( mps.amount_to_pay, ${decimalChoice} ) AS "Total a pagar" from m_ally_purchase_settlement mps left join custom.c_client_ally_point_of_sales ccapos on mps.point_of_sales_id = ccapos.id where mps.purchase_date BETWEEN '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' order by mps.purchase_date DESC
update.where: report_name='Informe de Liquidación de Compras de Aliados'

update.column: SELECT macs.id AS "ID", TO_CHAR( macs.collection_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY' ) AS "Fecha de Cobro", macs.nit AS "NIT", macs.client_ally_id AS "ID de Aliado del Cliente", macs.company_name AS "Nombre de la Empresa", ccapos.code AS "Código del Punto de Venta", macs.point_of_sales_name AS "Nombre del Punto de Venta", macs.city_id AS "ID de la Ciudad", macs.city_name AS "Nombre de la Ciudad", macs.collection_amount AS "Monto de Cobro", macs.tax_profile_id AS "ID del Perfil Tributario", macs.loan_id AS "ID del Préstamo", macs.client_id AS "ID del Cliente", macs.channel_id AS "ID del Canal" FROM m_ally_collection_settlement macs LEFT JOIN custom.c_client_ally_point_of_sales ccapos ON macs.point_of_sales_id = ccapos.id WHERE macs.collection_date BETWEEN '${startDate}' AND '${endDate}' ORDER BY macs.collection_date DESC
update.where: report_name='Informe de Liquidación de Cobros de Aliados'
